text:
Mason https://www.trymason.com San Francisco | Software Engineer | On-site Email kareem [at] trymason [dot] com (CTO)

We're building AWS for front-end software -> functional, configurable, framework-agnostic, codeless UI components served over API.

Tech stack: React, Redux, Go, Mongo, Hyperscript, Node

Compensation: $110K+ and real equity (we've raised only a large seed round)
